categories: Category:Events of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Nova Orion Crisis occurred in 1 ABY, when the founders on Nova Orion Industries, Jonas Nova and Garrick Orion, attempted to pull apart the company due to a gulf of suspicion between them.

The Nova Orion Crisis appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
